SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into lab_resources (name, uri, type, level, path, parent_id, order, class_name, permission_code, is_used, create_time, update_time, comment) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUsed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lab_resources set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uri = #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, level = #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order = #{order,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_code = #{permissionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_used = #{isUsed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, uri, type, level, path, parent_id, order, class_name, permission_code, is_used, create_time, update_time, comment from lab_resources where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
